protocol.name: P-G4021-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in a phytotron with a 14h day / 10h night. Temperature: 20Â°C / 16Â°C. Humidity: 60% / 75%. Lightintensity: .

protocol.name: P-G4021-2
protocol.text: Source leaf discs taken at the end of the night from non-flowering plants. Discs were incubated in the dark for one hour in 2mM MES buffer, pH 6.5 with (treatment) or without (control) 5mM dithiotreitol (DTT). After incubation discs were snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-G4021-4
protocol.text: Total RNA extraction using TRIzol Total RNA Isolation Reagent, according to the protocol supplied by the manufacturer GibcoBRL Life-Technologies.
